name: Little Hellions
description:
😈 FRIENDSHIP HURTS


4 friends. 1 weirdo mechanic. THROW AWAY YOUR FRIENDS with your trusty Trick Hook in this passive aggressive fighter where you can’t fight!

💣 DIVE INTO DANGER


Swap places at the last conceivable moment to catapult opponents into punishment meant for you. Master the Underworld's instruments of destruction and come up with new methods of torment with your slingshot-like Trick Hook.

💀 DENY DEATH


Parry anything. Cancel swaps, deflect traps, parry Death!

🍬 CANDY CARNAGE


Items are more than cheap tricks! Utilize their full potential with the Trick Hook to bamboozle the opposition.

💖 FOR BOTH GOBLINS AND SICKOS


Death isn't the end in the Underworld. KO'd players become ghosts, who can do anything living ones can - except win. Destroy the living to revive and get back in the action. Enjoy intense matches up till the last second, even if you're new.

🍩 WELCOME TO DIEMART


Collect VHS tapes, hangout in the DIEMART, and learn about the Underworld at Dumpster Fire Video. Or don't!
